::DarkMouse::

She growled as the Vok walked past her.  She sneered at his back.  
She hated this thing.  It not only smelled bad, but it gave her the 
creeps.  The energon boiled in her veins.  She hated letting this 
creature just walk in and do as he pleased.  She felt anger rage 
through her.  But what hurt more, was the fact she could do nothing.  
her leader just let them walk around.  Megatron made no attemp to 
stop them.  Black Aracnia seemed to show no sign of even trying to 
stop anything.  She looked at Quickstrike," My friend, I have had 
enough of this.   I will fight in a war, but I shall not share in the 
death of the world in this manner."  She walked off in mouse mode, 
headed away from the cave, the base and away from it all.  She headed 
for the caves that were far into the mountains and away from the 
wars.  She knew she would be able to hole up there adn wait for 
everyone to kill themselves.  Then she would join who ever was left.

She stopped and looked at Quickstrike one last time.



- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Hell Beast looked over the crowd standing before him. Apollo 
chose the 
> body, and in fact controlled it. This wasnt the real Hell Beast, 
just a 
> replica to get a rather messy job done.
>     "What are you trying to pull? Put your hands in the air or 
prepare to get 
> fried!" Aracnia said as she drew her bowcaster.
>     Hell Beast, better yet, Apollo, laughed at her. "Foolish 
transformer. You 
> do not know what your dealing with. Stand aside or I will be forced 
to 
> destroy you."
>     Tarantulas didnt like it ethier. He hated the Vok, and these 
Aliens were 
> far more annoying. "What do you want, exactly. Maximals? We have 
three of 
> them.....take them if you like."
>     Hell Beast glanced over to them. The Armada would be able to 
drain there 
> energy to power several different functions. "Very well. I will 
take the 
> Maximals. But for now I am going into that bunker to further my 
> investigation."
>     The Predacons agreed and let him go, but what no one saw was 
Megatron 
> sneaking away secretly, back to the Cave.
